edu.psu.cse.siis.coal.arguments

Class ClassValueAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.psu.cse.siis.coal.arguments.BackwardValueAnalysis
      • edu.psu.cse.siis.coal.arguments.ClassValueAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArgumentValueAnalysis

    public class ClassValueAnalysis
extends BackwardValueAnalysis
    An argument value analysis for class types.

        public Set<Object> computeArgumentValues(Argument argument,
                                soot.Unit callSite)
        Description copied from interface: ArgumentValueAnalysis
        Computes the possible argument value for a given statement and a given argument.
        Parameters:
        argument - An Argument.
        callSite - A call statement.
        Returns:
        The set of possible values for the argument.

      • findClassConstantValues

        public Set<Object> findClassConstantValues(soot.Unit start,
                                  soot.Value value)
        Returns the set of possible values of a variable of type class.
        Parameters:
        start - The statement where the analysis should start.
        value - The variable whose value we are looking for.
        Returns:
        The set of possible values for the variable.

      • handleInvokeExpression

        protected Set<Object> handleInvokeExpression(soot.jimple.Stmt sourceStmt,
                                 Set<soot.jimple.Stmt> visitedStmts)
        Returns the variable values that are associated with an call statement.
        Parameters:
        sourceStmt - The statement at which we should start.
        visitedStmts - The set of visited statements.
        Returns:
        The set of possible values.
